creator: esm-apache@logic.net
text:
The PGP signatures are there, but someone forgot to upload the accompanying RPMs
(tomcat4-4.0.3-1.noarch.rom, tomcat4-4.0.3-1.src.rpm, and
tomcat4-webapps-4.0.3-1.noarch.rpm) to go with it. ;-) Instead, there are copies
of the original 4.0.2 RPMs. Oops. ;-)

Tomcat 4.0.3 is indentical to 4.0.2, except for one change in one single class.
It's not surprising that nearly all the RPMs are identical (maybe they could be
renamed to avoid confusing people).
creator: remm@apache.org
